about_us: UXPH (User Experience Philippines) is a Filipino non-profit organization that hosts the largest network of design professionals, enthusiasts, and students in the Philippines. Since 2012, we have been building towards a more mature, collaborative, and design-driven country through hosting online and offline community initiatives, conferences, and programs within local design and technology communities.

UXPH has become the countryâ€™s hub for sharing information, resources, and building networks in the design community. As of 2020, the UXPH community has over 4,000 local and international members from a wide range of industries related to technology and even traditional businesses.
